title: Art Walk
description:
Art Walk is SOLD OUT. Please join us for future Evening Associate Events.

Join the Evening Associates Board of Directors at Art Walk and explore a dozen galleries and boutiques open late just for you. Take two unique routes through the River North neighborhood, experiencing a wide variety of art from around the world, including sculpture, ceramics, prints, paintings, photography, and installation art. Top this special night with an after-party at Marshall's Landing.

Proceeds from Art Walk support the Evening Associates’ mission to fund exhibitions at the Art Institute devoted to today's emerging artists. Attendees must be 21+, and valid ID is required upon entry.

This event is generously supported by Sipsmith.

Follow the Evening Associates on Facebook for the latest news and other events. @ArtInstitueEA
